  BOEM invites you to attend the upcoming opportunities to exchange information regarding offshore wind energy in the Gulf of Maine. In August 2022, the Department of the Interior announced a “Request for Interest” (RFI) to gauge whether there is commercial interest in obtaining wind energy leases within an area in the Gulf of Maine consisting of about 13.7 million acres.
